fullDescription.intro: Combase data is usually stored in a semistructured spreadsheet file. The CombaseReader reads in that file and stores its content in a structured table. Each entry in a Combase file describes a single growth/inactivation experiment. An experiment is characterized by time series data, information about the environmental conditions and physical parameters such as temperature, pH value or water activity.

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)

ports.outPort: A table that contains the time series and additional information.
